channel.title: Pages on Midnight
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Midnight

item.description: Welcome to my CTF writeups blog. I am a dedicated moslem with a strong commitment to cybersecurity, specializing in Capture the Flag (CTF) challenges and cryptographic principles. My journey is driven by a desire to build technical expertise while contributing to the greater goal of defending individuals and organizations from cybersecurity threats. I am particularly focused on advancing my knowledge in cryptography, penetration testing, and ethical hacking practices. Through my blog, I share my writeups and insights to help others learn, improve, and stay secure.
